features: Antioxidant-rich, removes excess oil, cleansing, and restores skin balance while delivering optimal hydration with nourishing herbal extracts that help calm and revitalize skin.
Directions: Step 02 of your daily face routine, use after shaving or cleansing. Mist over the face and neck area as needed (or use a cotton pad). Let dry or use fingers to gently massage into skin.
Key Ingredients: Collagen, Centella Asiatica & Witch Hazel Extracts, and Hyaluronic Acid.

Why HOMMEFACE? We develop simple, safe, and effective skincare solutions for men. With premium ingredients that actually work, HF products nourish and protect your skin so you look your best throughout the day.

Product Quality Standards: HOMMEFACE products are clean, vegan, Leaping Bunny certified cruelty-free, and formulated without Parabens, Sulfates or Alcohols. HF products are perfect for your daily skincare regimen.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HERBAL SPRAY TONER Calm & Balance Restores the moisture lost from cleansing and provides deep hydration with plant-based extracts to tone and revitalize the skin. For all skin types. How to Use: After cleansing or after shaving, mist onto the face and neck area (or use a cotton ball/pad). Follow use with Step 03 HF Face Moisturizer.
Product Features No SLS/SLES, NO Drying Alcohols.100% Vegan & Leaping Bunny-CertifiedDeveloped in smaller batches for quality and freshness.

Key Ingredients Collagen, Centella Asiatica, Tea Tree Leaf & Witch Hazel Extracts Helps to maintain moisture of the skin’s surface.Soothing and calming properties. Sodium Hyaluronate Creates a more supple, dewy, and radiant glow.Improves skin texture.Helps to improve the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

Daily Face Wash Herbal Spray Toner Face Moisturizer All-In-One Toner & Moisturizer Revitalizing Hydrogel Face Mask Set of 5 What it does Washes away impurities without drying out the skin. Restores skin balance, refreshes & hydrates skin. A light moisturizer that hydrates skin through the day. A 2-in-1 that balances & hydrates skin. Intensely hydrates, cleanses & purifies the skin. Steps Step 01 Step 02 Step 03 Steps 2+3 After Toner (Step 2) How to Use Cleanse twice a day in the AM & PM. Mist face & neck after cleansing. Apply on the face & neck area. Apply as needed after cleansing. Apply on clean/dry skin for 20-30 min. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Less bumps and no burn
reviews.reviewText: Was starting to see razor bumps and irritation on my face and head after shaving. After using this product for a week, I noticed less irritation.I spray it in my face and head after every shave. There’s no burning sensation, and the fragrance smells nice, not flowery, more of a fresh smellWould definitely buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Quick and easy to apply, it absorbs/dries quickly keeping my facial care routine short and sweet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very clean and refreshing. Non sticky as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product for price!
reviews.reviewText: I use this product along with Estee Lauder at night with A some retinal A cream. When i get out of shower i spray my face neck and ears. I like the scent leaves skin nice i have oily skin i notice my face isnt so oily with this product it controls it. Im 46 and look better than most 30yr olds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I love a good toner. I've tried my share of toners from high, mid, to low end. I use them daily and typically several times throughout my day. So, for the price of this one I can't complain! The top mists the face perfectly on this bad boy as well! It's refreshing, lightweight, and pleasantly scented! It tones and preps your skin beautifully for additional steps in your skincare routine as well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best facial toner I’ve ever used!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using facial toners for years and this one is the best by far! I love the scent, the way it makes my skin feel, and it’s truly helped my skin during this very dry weather we’ve been having. You will thank yourself for using this toner spray.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convinient and moisture
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for my husband who does not like to put any toner or lotion on his face because he has to open the cap/cover, and put them on his palm to put it on his face. (He was being lazy. Lol) This product is just perfect for my husband, now he’s just spraying on his face! Takes him 1 sec. What a convinient great thing! He also mentioned that it keeps him moisturized.
